column4: i've managed to get compiz working on my ati card on gutsy, but now 3d acceleration doesn't work in games like neverball, and amdccle/fireglcontrol claims that there's no ATI driver installed
If fglrxinfo gives you info about mesa than your drivers probably isnt installed correctly
nope, fglrxinfo says everything is fine
OpenGL renderer string: Radeon X1300/X1550 Series
